title: UberCab — 2008 Original Pitch Deck
summary: A mobility marketplace thesis with high upside and significant operational/regulatory execution risk.

title: WeWork — 2012 Pitch Deck
summary: A strong narrative business with heavy fixed-cost sensitivity and high expansion risk.

title: YouTube — 2005 Pitch Analysis
summary: A high-upside user-generated video platform with strong distribution potential and notable policy/legal risk.
